name: wigToBigWig
description: Convert ascii format wig file (in fixedStep, variableStep or bedGraph format) to binary big wig format

options.description: Number of items to bundle in r-tree. Default 256
Number of data points bundled at lowest level. Default 1024
If set just issue warning messages rather than dying if wig file contains items off end of chromosome or chromosomes that are not in the chrom.sizes file.
If set, do not use compression.
If set, use a predefined sequence of summary levels.
If set, store all chromosomes in b-tree.
